mapper.select: SELECT skssqs,skssqz,dssje FROM frk.cf_ss_nsjl_ds_valid WHERE frwybs = #{frwybs}

SELECT a.skssqs,a.skssqz,a.dssje,b.frmc,b.frwybs FROM frk.cf_ss_nsjl_ds_valid a, frk.ca_dj_jbxx b
a.frwybs = b.frwybs
AND a.dssje >= CAST (#{ProvincialTaxL} as NUMERIC )
AND a.dssje <= CAST (#{ProvincialTaxH} as NUMERIC )
AND frmc like '%'||#{frmc}||'%'
ORDER BY a.skssqs DESC
